# this is the build file for project pdflib
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.13.0)
project(pdflib VERSION 7.0.5 LANGUAGES C CXX ASM)

# target
add_library(pdflib STATIC "")
set_target_properties(pdflib PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "pdflib")
set_target_properties(pdflib PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "xmake.Build/debug")
target_include_directories(pdflib PRIVATE
    include
    src/pdcore
    src/font
)
target_include_directories(pdflib PRIVATE
    /usr/local/include
    /usr/local/include/freetype2
)
target_compile_definitions(pdflib PRIVATE
    FTGL_LIBRARY_STATIC
    MacOS=10.14
    NDEBUG
)
target_compile_options(pdflib PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-arch x86_64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-arch x86_64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-mmacosx-version-min=10.14>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-mmacosx-version-min=10.14>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.15.sdk>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX10.15.sdk>
)
target_link_libraries(pdflib PRIVATE
    z
)
target_link_options(pdflib PRIVATE
)
target_sources(pdflib PRIVATE
    src/font/ft_truetype.c
    src/font/ft_type1.c
    src/font/ft_cid.c
    src/font/ft_corefont.c
    src/font/ft_pdffont.c
    src/font/ft_font.c
